description: ERP tools for managing orders in the simulated business system.

tools.name: create_order
tools.description: Create a new order in the ERP system.

client_id.description: ID of the client placing the order.

items.description: List of items in the order.

tools.name: get_order_by_id
tools.description: Retrieve order information by order ID.

output_schema.description: Order information or null if not found.

tools.name: update_order_status
tools.description: Update the status of an existing order.

new_status.description: New status for the order (pending, processing, shipped, delivered, cancelled).

output_schema.description: Updated order information or null if not found.

tools.name: list_all_orders
tools.description: List all orders in the ERP system.
